sentence.text: We recently demonstrated that negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II is upregulated in melanoma and its inhibition by a small-molecule, tenovin-1, inhibits cell proliferation and clonogenic survival of melanoma cells, possibly via activating p53.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Here, we employed a gel free quantitative proteomics approach to identify the downstream effectors and targets of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in melanoma.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The qRT-PCR and immunoblot analyses showed that tenovin-1 inhibition of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II resulted in a downregulation of attachment of spindle microtubules to kinetochore, regulation of sister chromatid cohesion and ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process in multiple melanoma cell lines.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
attachment of spindle microtubules to kinetochore
